markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Suyuddha (The Warrior Queen)](/Deities.aspx?ID=245)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 64</row>

The Warrior Queen of the Impossible Kingdoms, Suyuddha is the patron goddess of Vudra's elite warriors, the padaprajna, and an unparalleled strategist who delights in war waged flawlessly. To Suyuddha, nothing compares to the thrill of seeing elaborate stratagems executed with absolute coordinated precision, of calculating foes' plans a dozen moves ahead and countering them before they're even conceived, of orchestrating perfect victory through intellectual superiority.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** study the art of warfare and strategy, strive to take and maintain control of your situation, hunt and slay hounds of Tindalos

**Anathema** let your emotions dictate your tactics, hunt felines for sport, permit others of your rank or lower to calculate tactics on your behalf

**Area of Concern**
battle, strategy, geometry

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, LN, N, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Tekko-Kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=304)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=26), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195)

- **2nd**
[Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)

- **5th**
[Strange Geometry](/Spells.aspx?ID=719)

</column>
name: Suyuddha (The Warrior Queen)
